reviewText: This DVD is excellent for any size group or individual for singing/music worship. The music is professionally done and the photography that goes along with each song adds to the full worship time especially if you are playing for a group. I like that it has a mixture of popular western praise songs in Japanese and original Japanese songs. Well worth having this in your music worship collection!

I viewed this for the first time last night and really appreciated it.  A mixture of contemporary western worship songs and some "home grown" worship that along with the video images makes for a ready made worship DVD.  And with the Romaji it is very useful. I would recommend it for personal worship or for a gathering of worshipers and can be used for Japanese and English speakers simultaneously.  Excellent!
